title: Dax Shepard | Trump's Racist Attacks on Democratic Congresswomen: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president mounting an appallingly racist attack on four Democratic women of color in Congress.

Then, Seth talks to actor Dax Shepard, who also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
